description: Java class defining a User entity for authentication, including fields for id, email, password hash, and creation timestamp, with relevant annotations for MongoDB integration and validation.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Entity representing a user for authentication, mapped to the 'users' collection in MongoDB.

methods.name: User
methods.description: Constructor to initialize User with email and passwordHash.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the user was created.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp for the user.
